5cc8e551a8c8944abb62f881268459aad0cefe25: Ikigai is the Japanese concept of a personal reason for being – a purpose or “raison d’être” that gives life meaning, satisfaction and happiness and motivates you to get up each morning. It is something hidden inside everyone that can be discovered through a patient search. [1] [2]
6cef138b3db94277df7265e65f8ba471b1a3c29e: The book argues that every person has a hidden “reason for being” (ikigai) that, when discovered, brings meaning, happiness and lasting health.  It teaches readers how to find this purpose by drawing on Japanese philosophy, the lifestyles of Okinawan centenarians, and practical habits such as community, moderate exercise, a light diet, and gentle movement.  In short, it offers tools and wisdom for living a long, joyful, and purpose‑driven life. [1] [2]
